short_definition: To deprive a person of his liberty by legal authority; to take a person who is suspected of a crime into official custody.
long_definition_html: To deprive a person of his liberty by legal authority; to take a person who is suspected of a crime into official custody.
long_definition_markdown: To deprive a person of his liberty by legal authority; to take a person who is suspected of a crime into official custody.
long_definition_text: To deprive a person of his liberty by legal authority; to take a person who is suspected of a crime into official custody.
